mapper.select: select userNo, userID, userPwd, userEmail, userJoinDate, managerClassification, userAddress, corpName, corpType, corpManager, phoneNo, creditStatus from Customer where userID = #{userID} and userPwd = #{userPwd} and rownum = 1
select * from Customer where sessionKey = #{value} and sessionLimit > SYSDATE and rownum = 1
select userID corpName from Customer where userEmail = #{param2} and rownum = 1
select userNo, userID, userPwd, userEmail, userJoinDate, managerClassification, userAddress, corpName, corpType, corpManager, phoneNo, creditStatus from Customer
select userNo, userID, userPwd, userEmail, userJoinDate, managerClassification, userAddress, corpName, corpType, corpManager, phoneNo, creditStatus from Customer where userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into Customer (userNo, userID, userPwd, userEmail, userJoinDate, managerClassification, userAddress, corpName, corpType, corpManager, phoneNo, creditStatus) values (userNo.NEXTVAL, #{userID}, #{userPwd}, #{userEmail}, SYSDATE, 0, #{userAddress}, #{corpName}, #{corpType}, #{corpManager}, #{phoneNo}, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from Customer where userNo>0

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from Customer where userNo>0
order by userNo desc) A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
